languages.text: "Спрашивай, людишко. Но постарайся не утомить меня своей болтовней".
"Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."
languages.original_text: "Спрашивай, людишко. Но постарайся не утомить меня своей болтовней".

traits.locale_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “尽管问吧，小人儿，但尽量别让我心烦。”
languages.original_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."

traits.locale_text: “尽管问吧，小人儿，但尽量别让我心烦。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Pregunta lo que quieras, human{mf|o|a}. Pero intenta no aburrirme».
languages.original_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."

traits.locale_text: «Pregunta lo que quieras, human{mf|o|a}. Pero intenta no aburrirme».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「なんでも聞くといい。つまらん質問をしたら追い出すぞ」
languages.original_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."

traits.locale_text: 「なんでも聞くといい。つまらん質問をしたら追い出すぞ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Fragt nur, Menschling. Bemüht Euch aber bitte, mich nicht zu langweilen."
languages.original_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."

traits.locale_text: "Fragt nur, Menschling. Bemüht Euch aber bitte, mich nicht zu langweilen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Posez-les donc, {mf|humain|humaine}, mais tâchez de ne pas m'ennuyer avec vos bavardages. »
languages.original_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."

traits.locale_text: « Posez-les donc, {mf|humain|humaine}, mais tâchez de ne pas m'ennuyer avec vos bavardages. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Sor bakalım insancık. Yalnız gevezelik edip kafamı şişirme."
languages.original_text: "Ask away, humanling. But try not to bore me with your chatter."

traits.locale_text: "Sor bakalım insancık. Ama gevezelik edip kafamı şişirme."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
